title: Best of the Program | Guest: Michael Rectenwald | 9/30/19
description:
The pieces are falling into place and destroying the whistleblower’s argument. For starters, the idea that Trump covered up his Ukraine call has been debunked, so now the Democrats want his calls with Vladimir Putin. Hillary Clinton also claimed that Trump is an “illegitimate president” who is obsessed with her. Author Michael Rectenwald joins to discuss another world influencer: the Google Archipelago. If the internet is just a “simulation of freedom,” will “reality” and “truth” soon mean something different?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
